awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 14 wins & 38 nominations.

fullplot: When Willy Wonka decides to let five children into his chocolate factory, he decides to release five golden tickets in five separate chocolate bars, causing complete mayhem. The tickets start to be found, with the fifth going to a very special boy, called Charlie Bucket. With his Grandpa, Charlie joins the rest of the children to experience the most amazing factory ever. But not everything goes to plan within the factory.
plot: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.
title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
